alert.note: Alert for Northwest Yell County; Southern Pope County; Southern and Eastern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 8:39AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Perry, central Yell and south central Pope Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 839 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Danville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danville... Dardanelle... Ola... Petit Jean River WMA... Galla Creek WMA... Mt Nebo State Park... Mosley... Corinth... Birta... Ranger... Holla Bend... Mt George... Kingston... Chickalah... Centerville... Fourche Junction... Nimrod... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Yell County; Southern Pope County; Southern and Eastern Logan County
